    Ascii
    Returns the ASCII code of the leftmost character of the given (char) expression.
    BinaryStringFunction<T,​R>
    Base class for binary functions that have the first parameter a string, the second parameter a number or a string and the result can be a string or a number.
    BinaryStringNumericFunction
    A binary string function with a numeric second parameter and a string result
    BinaryStringNumericPipe
    String operations pipe requiring one string and one numeric argument.
    BinaryStringNumericProcessor
    Processor class covering string manipulating functions that have the first parameter as string, second parameter as numeric and a string result.

    A binary string function with two string parameters and a numeric result
    BinaryStringStringPipe
    String operations pipe requiring two string arguments.
    BinaryStringStringProcessor
    Processor class covering string manipulating functions that have two string parameters and a numeric result.
